summary: Project involves a product/store page featuring a cricket bat image and a price field.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- A clean studio-style cricket bat illustration on a transparent or light neutral background (cricket-bat.dim_400x400.png)

existing_features.title: In the ProductShowcase component, replace the image of the product card at grid position 3 (the element identified by XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/section[2]/div[1]/div[2]/div[3]/div[2]/div[1]) with a generated cricket bat image asset (cricket-bat.dim_400x400.png) stored in frontend/public/assets/generated/.

In the ProductShowcase component, update the price displayed in the product card at grid position 4 (the element identified by XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/section[2]/div[1]/div[2]/div[4]/div[3]/p[2]) to 999.

new_feature_requests.summary: Replace existing image with a cricket bat image
